data.current_summary: Get sentiments by Amadeus Hotel Ids
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve hotel sentiment ratings by hotel ID
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves sentiment analysis and ratings for one or more hotels identified by their Amadeus Hotel IDs. Returns sentiment scores across multiple categories (e.g., cleanliness, service, value) and an overall hotel rating score (0-100 scale). Useful for understanding guest feedback and satisfaction levels. Note: Test environment includes limited hotel data (10 in London, 14 in New York).
